#summary This is the Roadmap for WebcamStudio
#labels Phase-Requirements
= Introduction =

Here you can find what the [WebcamStudioTeam WebcamStudio Team] plans for the application, who is in charge of the planned changes etc.

 * Tasks are listed by priority in order they appear from top priority to less important.
 * The format of this is:
   _TASK -> PERSON ASSIGNED TO_
 * Developers of the Team, when a task is completed, please use the wiki strikeout font to acknowledge this (surround the text with two tildes ~TEXT~)

 * Fixing all the [https://code.google.com/p/webcamstudio/issues/list issues] related to the current development branch (which is 0.6 series) -> *[WebcamStudioTeam WebcamStudio Team]*

 * Start working on a better user interface with better accessibility  -> *to be assigned*
 * Adding new features to the application
